context.goal:
Develop and launch an AI-powered project management platform that helps teams 
            collaborate more effectively using natural language processing and machine learning.
constraints: Need to ensure data privacy and security compliance
Must be scalable to handle enterprise-level usage
Should integrate with popular project management tools

roles.responsibilities: Oversee the development and launch of the AI platform, ensure data privacy and security compliance, and scalability
roles.required_skills: Technical leadership, AI expertise, project management, data privacy and security knowledge
roles.key_metrics: Platform development progress, data security compliance, platform performance and scalability
roles.collaboration_patterns: Working closely with the CPO and CIO to align on platform features and integrations
roles.trust_requirements: High trust in technical decision-making and security compliance
roles.decision_authority: Full authority on technical decisions and security compliance
roles.communication_channels: Regular technical team meetings, C-level meetings, email, and collaboration tools
roles.success_criteria: Successful launch of AI platform within timeframe, no security breaches, effective platform scalability

roles.responsibilities: Define product vision, align with customer needs, ensure integration with popular project management tools
roles.required_skills: Product management, customer research, project management, collaboration tools knowledge
roles.key_metrics: Product development progress, customer satisfaction, integration success
roles.collaboration_patterns: Working closely with the CTO to align on technical feasibility and the CMO for market alignment
roles.trust_requirements: High trust in product decision-making and customer alignment
roles.decision_authority: Full authority on product decisions and customer alignment
roles.communication_channels: Regular product team meetings, C-level meetings, email, and collaboration tools
roles.success_criteria: Successful launch of product with desired features, high customer satisfaction, successful integrations

roles.responsibilities: Ensure IT infrastructure supports platform scalability and data security, manage integrations
roles.required_skills: IT management, data security, knowledge of project management tools and integrations
roles.key_metrics: IT infrastructure readiness, data security compliance, integration success
roles.collaboration_patterns: Working closely with the CTO on infrastructure and security matters and the CPO on integrations
roles.trust_requirements: High trust in IT decision-making and security compliance
roles.decision_authority: Full authority on IT decisions and security compliance
roles.communication_channels: Regular IT team meetings, C-level meetings, email, and collaboration tools
roles.success_criteria: IT support for successful launch and scaling of the platform, no security breaches, successful integrations

roles.responsibilities: Market research, product promotion, customer acquisition and retention
roles.required_skills: Marketing strategy, customer acquisition, market research
roles.key_metrics: Customer acquisition and retention rates, marketing campaign success
roles.collaboration_patterns: Working closely with the CPO on product features and customer feedback
roles.trust_requirements: High trust in marketing decisions and customer acquisition strategies
roles.decision_authority: Full authority on marketing decisions and strategies
roles.communication_channels: Regular marketing team meetings, C-level meetings, email, and collaboration tools
roles.success_criteria: High customer acquisition and retention rates, successful marketing campaigns
